jobs.name: alerts_std_tradable
jobs.sql: SELECT * FROM canon.alerts_std WHERE mint IS NOT NULL AND trim(mint) <> ''

jobs.name: schema_schemas
jobs.sql: SELECT schema_name FROM information_schema.schemata ORDER BY schema_name

jobs.name: schema_objects
jobs.sql: SELECT table_schema, table_name, table_type FROM information_schema.tables ORDER BY table_schema, table_type, table_name

jobs.name: schema_columns
jobs.sql: SELECT table_schema, table_name, column_name, data_type, is_nullable, ordinal_position FROM information_schema.columns ORDER BY table_schema, table_name, ordinal_position

jobs.name: schema_views
jobs.sql: SELECT table_schema, table_name, view_definition FROM information_schema.views ORDER BY table_schema, table_name
